tool.name: OGS: swapNodeCoordinateAxes
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'swapNodeCoordinateAxes'.
tool.command: if [ "$input_mesh_file" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$input_mesh_file.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$input_mesh_file' '${$input_mesh_file.element_identifier}'; fi; swapNodeCoordinateAxes --input-mesh-file '$input_mesh_file.element_identifier' --new-order '$new_order' --output-mesh-file output_1.vtu

param.name: new_order
param.label: new order
param.help: the new order of swapped coordinate values (e.g. 'xzy' for converting XYZ values to XZY values)

tool.help: This tool runs the **swapNodeCoordinateAxes** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
